title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in the Czech Republic 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2020.
The line significantly increased by 1.9 from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 4.35 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.45 was reached at Year 2016, and 2019
min_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2020.
mid_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2020.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.

max_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 4.35 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.45 was reached at Year 2016, and 2019
The line drastically increased by 1.8 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
